      • askSaveFirst

        public int askSaveFirst(java.lang.String action,
                        java.lang.String capAction)
        Convenient method asking the user to save the project (if it's modified) first before committing to an action that may discard any modifications that have been made.
        Parameters:
        action - A concise description of the user action
        capAction - Same with action, but with first letter capitalized
        Returns:
        2 if user canceled / closed the dialog, -1 if saving was not necessary, 0 if user saved the file, 1 if the user did not save

      • simBegin

        public void simBegin()
        Begin simulation routine. External classes MUST call this method if g_dev is at all available to the user instead of directly using ProjectDriver's simulate method.

      • simEnd

        public void simEnd()
        End simulation routine. External classes MUST call this method if g_dev is at all available to the user instead of directly using the ProjectDriver's desimulate method.
